jobDescription: Love your job! We are presently seeking a hands-on QUALITY MANAGER with solid experience working within a custom machining / precision metal fabrication job shop manufacturing environment.  Our client company is a successful Multi-Billion dollar contract manufacturer, who specializes in custom products ranging from commercial electronics and precision machined components.  Their operation, located in the San Jose, CA area, is a subcontractor for precision machined parts for the aerospace, electronics and semiconductor processing equipment industries. It employs a blend of high volume / low mix and low volume / high mix production within a cellular manufacturing environment.  The Quality Manager will be in charge of leading all quality engineering efforts for two separate plants within the San Jose areadrive continuous improvement through the development and implementation of Quality processes, systems, tools and techniques.live the company's commitment to Lean Six Sigma manufacturing practices. This is an excellent career opportunity to be a part of a well established and financially secure leader in the custom machining / fabrication arena. Strong long-term advancement potential. Exceptional compensation and benefits.REQUIREMENTS:Must have a strong quality engineering background within a custom machining / metal fabrication job shop manufacturer. Will not consider anyone without any contract / job shop manufacturing experience.Bachelors degree, preferably in Mechanical Engineering. BSME7+ years of quality engineering experience, including 5 years in a supervisory capacity.Lean Six Sigma Black or Green Belt and/or an ASQ CQE certification is a big plus, but not required. #LI-SK1
